good according to the order. The cushion is long-lasting, suitable for warm-toned tanned skin. The coverage is also good

The shade matches my skin tone perfectly. It doesn't make it gray and doesn't oxidize. Alhamdulillah, my face is not textured, meaning there are no pimples or craters. Because the shade fits perfectly, it's like I'm not wearing a cushion but my face is super flawless. The coverage is quite full but it doesn't make it cakey as long as the skin prep is right. It lasts on my face and doesn't fade easily even after using a primer. For those of you with light medium skin (as people say, your skin is white) with neutral undertones (greenish-blue veins or vice versa), you can use this shade, Granola. If you use custard, it's too light and yellow. Moreover, the shade above custard is definitely white. If you have medium skin (darker than the previous light medium but not dark brown) with neutral undertones, you can use the Biscuit shade. The photo is original, no filter. In the photo, I use moisturizer, sunscreen, and primer before the cushion. This is after using the cushion for 4 hours. My skin type is a combination of oily dt zone and normal du zone. Recommended product and recommended shop. Hopefully the review can help friends who are still confused üëçüèª
